summary: Request to include update handler and ID in logging context for better observability. An example implementation using interceptors is available in the samples.
userImpact: Users cannot easily track which update handler is executing in their logs without manual context management.
proposedFix: Implement built-in logger with interceptors to automatically add UpdateID and UpdateName to logging context, following the pattern shown in samples-php PR #62
workaround: Users can implement a custom logger using interceptors as demonstrated in samples-php PR #62
resolutionDetails: SDK does not have a built-in logger yet; users can implement via interceptors as shown in example
keyQuote: We don't have a built-in logger in the SDK yet, but there is an example of a logger using interceptors
